snippet: The verdict ended a politically charged two-year sodomy trial in which Anwar Ibrahim, the opposition leader, faced as many as 20 years in prison.
abstract: Surprise acquittal of Malaysian opposition leader Anwar Ibrahim of sodomy charges is likely to make country's next national elections a tightly contested affair; verdict ends a politically charged two-year trial in which Ibrahim faced as many as 20 years in prison.
lead_paragraph: The verdict ended a politically charged two-year sodomy trial in which Anwar Ibrahim, the opposition leader, faced as many as 20 years in prison.

headline.seo: Anwar Acquitted, Altering Malaysian Political Outlook
headline.main: Acquittal of Opposition Leader May Level Field in Malaysia
headline.print_headline: Acquittal of Opposition Leader May Level Field in Malaysia
